channel.title: My first model (morrigan's spear)pics coming tommor
channel.description:
hi i have just made this model and its fully set up but i need someone to make to a client model and send back. here are some pics
i will add pics tomorrow
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?e1vvmdjohgn]http://www.mediafire.com/?e1vvmdjohgn[/url]

item.title: My first model (morrigan's spear)pics coming tommor
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

no problem, i dont know if the int’s are perfect, but it should work.
i also made a HUGE modification to your model, by making it 2 sided and fixing some face issue’s, btw do u want the new .mqo file?
and also…
WHY DID YOU HAVE OVER 30 COLOR’s IN THE MAT PANEL???
lol sorry for cap’s but yeah, i had to re mat most of the model
it was like 1 color per face :F

Read full topic

item.title: My first model (morrigan's spear)pics coming tommor
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

here’s the int’s and gziped model

if(i == 8000) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 8001; class8.anInt165 = 8000; class8.anInt200 = 8000; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 1450; class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1100; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Morrigan's spear"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "An ancient war spear. ".getBytes(); // Item Examine }

download:

http://www.mediafire.com/?tiljldgmmgj

you know what to do
